Reviews.Content: Don't Stay There I booked a room at the Hotel Souvenir through [--] on 17th May 2006. Upon arriving at the hotel the staff looked at my booking confirmation (printed at the time of booking) but couldn鈥檛 find me a room to stay in. After waiting in the hotel foyer for around 90 minutes the staff tried to take payment for the room in cash. Thinking that it was odd to reserve a room using my card and be asked to pay in cash, and as I still had not been given a room, I did not pay. The hotel staff disappeared again for around 20 minutes and eventually I decided to leave and find somewhere else to stay. I did not stay at the hotel, and it was entirely their fault, yet they still charged me! Not impressed...
Reviews.Author: BtheMaddestWanderer

Reviews.Content: Wouldn't trust the Hotel (Pensione) Souvenir in Florence I found them on the internet. I read some reviews and other than people thinking it was a little noisy and could be a bit cleaner, it seemed good. I wrote to them on email, and M. Masi, the manager wrote write back. I also phoned and spoke to him twice. All was reserved and I let him know I'd be there at 10 pm on September 13. When I arrived, I walked up the several flights of stairs, and the door was locked to the front desk. I tried ringing the bell, and phoning the two phone numbers -- no answer. I went down to a hotel across the street, and they could not give me any information. For an hour, I tried to get some sort of response. By 11 pm, I gave up and went to another hotel down the street. In the morning, I met M. Masi and reminded him of my reservation. He explained he had been dancing in the square and listening to the music. He showed me two rooms and I told him I'd be back in 10 minutes with my luggage. He was not there, I went back twice more over the course of a couple of hours, he was never there. I stayed elsewhere. I'd advise anyone, especially as a women traveling alone, late at night, that this was not the most professional situation.
Reviews.Author: gigsgillespie

Reviews.Content: Great spot Beppe was wonderful to us and the hotel was clean and wonderful. Very nicely located, quiet and perfect for our teenagers.
